trans-unit.target: Rajab 922 AH.
August to September, 1517 CE.
(Excerpt A from observations of the traveler Visconti Gianti

trans-unit.source: الَّذِي زَارَ الْقَاهِرَةَ أَكْثَرَ مِن مَرَّةٍ فِي الْقَرْنِ السَّادِس عَشَر الْمِيْلَادِيّ أَثْنَاءَ طَوَافِهِ بِالْعَالَمِ .
trans-unit.target: who visited Cairo more than once in the 16th century CE. during his travels of the world

trans-unit.source: تُسَجِّلُ ه­َذِهِ الْمُشَاهَدَاتُ أَحْوَالَ الْقَاهِرَةِ خِلَالَ شَهْرِ أُغُسْطُس ١٥١٧ مِيْلَادِيَّةً الْمُوَافِقَ رَجَب ٩٢٢ هـ )
trans-unit.target: These observations record the circumstances of Cairo during the month of August 1517 CE., corresponding to Rajab 922 AH.)
(To every first a last, and to every beginning an ending.)

trans-unit.source: تَضْطَرِبُ أَحْوَالُ دِيَارَ مِصْرَ هَذِهِ الْأَيَامَ ،
trans-unit.target: The circumstances of the territories of Misr are disturbed these days
trans-unit.note: Misr (مِصْر) refered to a specific location in Cairo. دِيار, (sing. دار) would thus refer to the lands controlled by the seat of power, i.e. the Mamluk Empire, rather than Egypt alone.

trans-unit.target: The face of Cairo is a stranger to me

trans-unit.source: لَيْسَ مَا عَرَفْتُهُ في رِحَلَاتِي السَّابِقَةِ ،
trans-unit.target: It is not what I knew in my previous visits
The talk of the people has changed
I know the language and dialects of the country

trans-unit.source: أَرَى وَجْهَ الْمَدِيْنَةِ مَرِيْضًا يُوْشِكُ على الْبُكَاءِ ،
trans-unit.target: I see the face of the city [as] ill, verging on sobbing

trans-unit.source: امْرَأَةٌ مَذْعُوْرَةٌ تَخْشَى اغْتِصَابَهَا آخِرَ اللَّيْلِ ،
trans-unit.target: A terrified woman, fearing rape late at night
Even the skies are a thin blue
Their purity murky

trans-unit.source: مُغَطَّاةٌ بِضَبَابٍ قَادِمٍ مِنْ بِلَادٍ بَعِيْدَةٍ ،
trans-unit.target: Covered with a fog from a distant country

trans-unit.source: أَذْكُرُ قُرَى الْهِنْدِ الصَّغِيْرَةِ إِذْ يُدْرِكُهَا الْوَبَاءُ ،
trans-unit.target: I recall the small villages of India when the plague overtakes them
Their atmosphere burdened by humidity
Tonight the houses await something

trans-unit.source: قَدْ يَأْتِي غَدًا أَوْ بَعْدَ غَدٍ
trans-unit.target: It may come tomorrow, or the day after

trans-unit.source: أُصْغِي إلى وَقْعِ حَوَافَرَ تَصْطَدِمُ بِحِجَارَةِ الطَّرِيْقِ ،
trans-unit.target: I listen to the clatter of hooves striking the cobblestones of the street
Receding, growing distant

trans-unit.source: أُطِلُّ مِن مَشْرَبِيَّةِ الْبَيْتِ مُحَاذِرًا أَنْ يَرَانِي أَحَدٌ ،
trans-unit.target: I peer out from the mashrabiyya of the house carefully, lest anyone see me
I peer and the shadows swaddle the houses

trans-unit.source: لَا أَرَى مِئْذَنَةَ جَامَعِ السُّلْطَانِ الْغُوْرِي الْجَدِيْد ،
trans-unit.target: I don't see the minaret of the new Sultan Goury Mosque
Not many years have passed since it was built

trans-unit.source: لَمْ أَرَهُ عِنْدَمَا جِئْتُ هُنَا آخِرَ مَرَّةٍ قَبْلَ رَحِيْلِي الطَّوِيْلِ إلى الشَّرْقِ ،
trans-unit.target: I did not see it the last time I came, before my long journey to the East
I heard of the preparations for building it
Erecting the great dome opposite it
I poke my head out a little

trans-unit.source: أَخَافُ انْفِتَاقَ الظَّلَامِ عَنْ وُجُوْهِ دَرَكٍ قُسَاةِ الْقُلُوْبِ ،
trans-unit.target: I fear the darkness may split and reveal the faces of the hard-hearted guards

trans-unit.source: إِذْ يَجِدُوْنَنِي أَفْرَنْجِيًّا ، يَدْفَعُوْنَ بِي إلى الْمَوْتِ بِلَا مُحَاكَمَةٍ ،
trans-unit.target: If they find me, a foreigner, they will usher me to death without trial

trans-unit.source: لَا اسْتِجْوَابَ ، لَا سُؤَالَ ، مَنْ أَنَا ، مِنْ أَيْنَ جِئْتَ !!
trans-unit.target: No interrogation, no question of who I am, where I am from!
No chance provided to inform them, to convince them

trans-unit.source: إِنَّنِي أَعْرِفُ الْوَالِيَ الْأَمِيْرَ «كُرْتْبَايْ» مَعْرِفَةً شَخْصِيَّةً ،
trans-unit.target: That I know the Governor, the Emir Kurtbey, that I personally know him

trans-unit.source: بَلْ إِنَّنِي أَصْغَيْتُ مَرّتَيْنِ إلى مُتَوَلِّي حَسَبَةِ الْقَاهِرَةِ ،
trans-unit.target: Even that I have listened twice to the Muhtasib of Cairo
Zayni Barakāt ibn Musa
He holds many other offices
And is responsible for preservation of security and order
If he saw me he would remember me

trans-unit.source: أَعْرِفُ أَنَّهُ لَا يَنْسَى وَجْهًا عَابِرًا رَآهُ مَرَةً وَاحِدَةً ،
trans-unit.target: I know that he never forgets a face even if he sees it only once

trans-unit.source: حَتَّى لَوْ مَضَى على رُؤْيَتِهِ لَصَاحِبِهِ عَشَرَةُ أَعْوَامٍ ،
trans-unit.target: Even if ten years have passed since he saw it
In any case I shall remain, tonight

trans-unit.source: بِالتَّأْكِيْدِ لَنْ أَنْجُوَ مِن الْعَسَسِ ، الْمِنْسِرِ ، الْمَمَالِيْكِ ،
trans-unit.target: Definitely I would not be safe from the watchmen, the brigands, the Mamluks
The houses of the city, all of them are locked and trembling
They want to hide
Be exiled to the security desired
The candles of my house are extinguished

trans-unit.source: أَخْشَى تَرَاقُصَ الضَّوْءِ في أَحْدَاقِ الْعُيُوْنِ الْمُتَلَصِّصَةِ
trans-unit.target: I fear the light dancing in the pupils of the eyes of the watchers
